main event: An F-102 interceptor pilot observed a small cylindrical object at high altitude, described as having a white outer layer with a dark center, which exhibited unusual flight patterns on 9 June 1958.
interesting points: The object was seen traveling at a terrific speed before hovering and closing in on the observer, The pilot reported that the object made several small erratic orbits around him, The object disappeared rapidly after climbing, The sighting lasted for approximately 4 minutes, Analysis suggests the observation might have been of a balloon due to its behavior and altitude.
witness description: 1st Lt. Scharf, a military pilot with 4 years flying experience
